query:
ALTER TABLE project_permissions 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS companyId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS grantedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute ALTER TABLE project_permissions 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS companyId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS grantedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
